title: Vaibhava Diamond-Studded Gold Bangles (Gaajulu)
materials: G Color). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: Contemporary design featuring a streamlined, rigid silhouette with strategically placed diamond embellishments. The gold setting is handcrafted with a unique textured surface, creating a distinctive light-catching effect. The diamonds are set in a secure prong setting ensuring brilliance and longevity. No nakshi or temple designs are present, but the high polish elevates the overall look.
colors: Lustrous Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a stylish addition to traditional attire for events like Diwali and weddings. Suitable for modern brides seeking a blend of classic and contemporary aesthetics.
description: Crafted with the finest 22K gold and brilliant-cut diamonds, these bangles exude luxury and sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting, radiant shine. The modern design offers a versatile piece that can be paired with both Indian and Western outfits. An excellent investment piece due to the inherent value of gold and diamonds.
